Name: Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020
About the game: Don’t wait for hours to get your videos converted. Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020 will transform your videos in no time – and with no loss of quality. Reduce the file size for your favorite movies and TV series so they take less space on your hard drive, and convert them to any of 180+ supported formats. Popular Formats and Ready-made Presets Use any popular multimedia format in the converter: MP4, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, WMV;MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, AAC; JPG, PNG, GIF, RAW formats, and more. Save your multimedia files with the optimal settings for uploading to YouTube and other platforms, or make them perfect for viewing on any device. Use ready-made presets for smartphones, tablets, and laptops, so you can upload your video on the target device right after conversion. Online Subtitle Search With Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020, you can search for subtitles online right from the program. Choose the language you need, the season and episode number, and even the IMDb ID. Video Converter adds downloaded subtitles to the video automatically. You can also change the subtitle font, color, and size. Ultrafast Conversion With support for many types of hardware acceleration, file conversion will take no time at all. The program’s compatibility with Intel®, AMD®, and NVIDIA® technologies will help convert files 3-5 times faster! Try the SuperSpeed mode for HD movies: the program converts any size videos in no time and preserves quality. Easy Editing Enhance your files with the built-in editor: Trim videos without converting them, instantly and without loss of quality Create animated intros or overlay image watermarks Change volume levels, remove background noise Change the font, color, and size of subtitles Select audio streams, bitrates, and subtitle tracks for all files at once Adjust colors, add video-enhancing filters File conversion with Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020 takes next to no time and delivers the highest possible quality.
